amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 589 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 2. Record Vote Number: 148.

action.text: Amendment SA 589 proposed by Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S6197-6198; text: CR S6197) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits.
